reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Technical support for Kontakt plus radio

description.narrative: In Mitrovica the city with approximately 17 thousand of inhabitants Radio Kontakt Plus is the only existing radio station with news programs. Contact Plus is by far the most popular radio station in Mitrovica and Zvecan and also among the thirty most list ened stations that broadcast stations in the Serbian (minority) language in Kosovo however due to the bad conditions in Mitrovica regarding electricity the station has been unable to broadcast programs because of the frequent power cuts. Radio station doe s not own a equipment (aggregate/generator) to continue work when electricity is cut. In this project the station will procure a generator that will guarantee the electricity flow on the radio station Kontakt Plus to ensure the normal broadcasting of their programs. Project objectives:- To improve daily radio station broadcast- Improve regular information flow toward the citizens of Mitrovica
